title: Galatea
description: Galatea is a fun application / game for practicing divination, and the constituent part is a 36-pack set of cards popularly called Gypsy or Gypsy Tarot Cards.

title: Task Monster
description: Task Monster is a simple and smart application to work with task that simplifies the planning of everyday tasks. Another great feature of the app is that you can choose, name and tend your own monster.
tech: Angular 4, Ionic 3, HTML, CSS, Photoshop, Inkscape
